titles.title: Sing in the midst of the congregation;

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Sing in the midst of the congregation;
Sing unto the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For He is great, and greatly to be praised.
He is great, and greatly to be praised.
So sing unto the Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Clap in the midst of the congregation;
Clap unto the Lord.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
For He is great, and greatly to be praised.
He is great, and greatly to praised.
So clap unto the Lord.
